summary:
Honda is a Japanese company that makes cars, motorcycles, and other machines. It was started in 1946 by Soichiro Honda. Honda is the biggest motorcycle maker in the world and also makes many car engines. It is the second-largest car company in Japan.

The company has a luxury car brand called Acura. Honda also makes garden tools, boat engines, and robots. They are involved in aerospace too, building engines and jets. Honda invests a lot in new ideas and research.
title: Honda
